_comment: TEMPLATE: Row Selection Configuration - Copy this file and rename it to '[viewname]-selection.json'
_description: Configure row selection features including checkboxes, select-all functionality, and bulk actions.
_usage: Enable selection if you need users to select rows for actions like delete, export, or bulk updates.

_options.enabled: true/false - Enable/disable row selection feature entirely

_selectAllOptions.selectAll: true/false - Show 'Select All' checkbox in header row
_selectAllOptions.behavior: Clicking selects all visible/filtered rows (not just current page)

_bulkActionsOptions.bulkActions: Array of action names that can be performed on selected rows
_bulkActionsOptions.buttonLocation: Bulk action buttons appear above table when rows selected

_persistOptions.persistSelection: true/false - Save selection state to localStorage (persists between page reloads)
_persistOptions.warning: Enable only if selection should survive navigation/refresh

_checkboxColumnOptions.checkboxColumn: Number (zero-based) - Which column contains the selection checkboxes
_checkboxColumnOptions.styling: Column automatically gets checkbox styling and narrow width

_advancedOptions.multiSelect: true/false - Allow selecting multiple rows (false = single selection only)
_advancedOptions.clickToSelect: true/false - Click anywhere on row to select (not just checkbox)
_advancedOptions.selectOnEdit: true/false - Automatically select row when editing a cell
_advancedOptions.maxSelection: Number or null - Maximum rows that can be selected (null = unlimited)

_selectionBehavior.checkbox: Click checkbox to select/deselect individual row
_selectionBehavior.selectAll: Header checkbox selects all visible/filtered rows
_selectionBehavior.keyboard: Space bar to select current row (if keyboard navigation enabled)
_selectionBehavior.visual: Selected rows highlighted with different background color
_selectionBehavior.counter: Shows count of selected rows (e.g., '3 rows selected')
_selectionBehavior.bulkActions: Action buttons appear when rows are selected

fullFeatured.description: Complete row selection with bulk actions

singleSelect.description: Select only one row at a time (radio button behavior)

clickAnywhere.description: Click anywhere on row to select

_bestPractices: Place checkbox in first column (checkboxColumn: 0) for consistency
Enable selectAll for user convenience when dealing with bulk operations
Only enable persistSelection if selection needs to survive page refresh
Limit bulkActions to what's actually needed - don't overwhelm users
Use multiSelect: false for single-selection scenarios (like choosing one item)
Always provide visual feedback for selected rows (automatic)
Show bulk action buttons only when rows are selected
Require confirmation for destructive bulk actions (delete, archive)
Test bulk actions with edge cases (all selected, none selected, filtered rows)
Consider maxSelection for performance with very large datasets

_bulkActionImplementation.naming: Function name should match action name (e.g., 'delete' -> handleBulkDelete)
_bulkActionImplementation.parameters: Functions receive array of selected row data
_bulkActionImplementation.confirmation: Always confirm destructive actions (use modal or confirm dialog)
_bulkActionImplementation.feedback: Show success/error messages after bulk action completes
_bulkActionImplementation.refresh: Refresh table data after bulk action completes

_userInterface.checkboxes: Checkboxes in designated column for each row
_userInterface.selectedCount: Text showing '3 rows selected' above table
_userInterface.bulkActionBar: Button bar appears above table when rows selected
_userInterface.clearSelection: Button or link to deselect all rows
_userInterface.visualHighlight: Selected rows have distinct background color
_userInterface.indeterminate: Select-all checkbox shows indeterminate state when some (not all) selected

_accessibility.checkboxLabels: Each checkbox has descriptive ARIA label
_accessibility.announcements: Selection changes announced to screen readers
_accessibility.keyboard: Space bar to select, arrow keys to navigate

_integration.export: Export only selected rows (if rows are selected)
_integration.editing: Can combine with inline editing (selectOnEdit option)

_performance.smallTables: No performance impact on tables < 1,000 rows
_performance.largeTables: Consider maxSelection to prevent selecting thousands of rows
_performance.persistSelection: Storing large selections in localStorage may impact performance
_performance.bulkActions: Process bulk actions in batches for large selections (100+ rows)
_performance.optimization: Use server-side processing for bulk actions on very large datasets

_troubleshooting.checkboxNotAppearing: Verify checkboxColumn index matches your column count
_troubleshooting.selectAllNotWorking: Check that selectAll is true and checkboxColumn is valid
_troubleshooting.persistenceIssues: Check browser localStorage permissions and quotas
_troubleshooting.bulkActionNotFiring: Verify function name matches action name in custom-handlers.js
_troubleshooting.selectionLost: If persistSelection=false, selection clears on page change (expected)

_whenToDisable: Table is read-only with no actions
Single row interaction only (use clickable rows instead)
Very simple table with minimal interaction
Mobile-first design where checkboxes are too small
Data is automatically processed (no user action needed)
_whenToEnable: Users need to delete multiple rows
Users work with subsets of data
